articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Skiing Training of Mountain Infantry Battalion under KPA Unit 1045
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Skiing Training of Mountain Infantry Battalion under KPA Unit 1045
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, guided the skiing training of the mountain infantry battalion under KPA Unit 1045.
					 After hearing a report on the training plan, he issued an order to start the training.
					
					 The moment a training officer shouted a command, soldiers appeared on the top of a mountain all of a sudden and skied down a steep slope, flying the colours of the supreme commander and the national flag of the Republic.
					
					 Watching the soldiers skiing down the slope like the wind while admirably conducting various difficult combat actions, he highly praised them for their successful training.
					
					 He underscored the need to steadily improve the forms and methods of mountain infantry training in quality as required by modern warfare and the features of offensive and defensive operation theatres and maximize the demand for training under the simulated conditions of an actual battle so as to decisively improve the marksmanship of the soldiers and decisively bolster up their capabilities to overcome mountains, speed up the march on them, carry out assault and maneuver in the field.
					
					 Saying that the mountain infantry soldiers must strike the enemy troops without giving them a chance to recover their senses by crossing mountains in the theater of battle in emergency, he called on the commanding officers to organize combat drills under the simulated conditions of a real battle by taking advantage of the most rugged terrains and thus train them to be brave and agile fighters.
					
					 He highly praised them for their successful training and had a photo session with them.
					
					 He set forth tasks facing the mountain infantry units, noting that they have important combat missions to perform as the country has steep mountain ridges and a lot of snow. 
					
					 Accompanying him was Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye and Her Group Hit for Letting out Litany of Invective Denying Reality in DPRK
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye and Her Group Hit for Letting out Litany of Invective Denying Reality in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The northern part of the DPRK which had been hit by an unprecedented natural disaster turned into a socialist land of bliss in two months to startle the world with the miracle of turning adversity into favorable conditions and the songs of big fish haul presenting spectacular scenery are resounding far and wide in the vast East Sea of Korea.
					 Happy laughter of the people celebrating Mothers' Day is heard throughout the country.
					
					 A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council in a statement Saturday said only Park Geun Hye and her group of south Korea are speaking ill of the stirring reality in the DPRK just like a group of rabid dogs at a time when the world is admiring it.
					
					 People moved into new houses in new streets and villages in the flood-hit areas in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province, a happy event, but gentries of the puppet ministry of unification in south Korea talked nonsense that the north's hasty completion of the operation for recovering from flood was aimed to "boost the morale of inhabitants and advocate the spirit of patriotism". Echoing their claim, some reptile conservative media described the "news of big fish haul in the north" as a hype and the "north's institution of Mothers' Day as a propaganda about its social system," the statement notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is nothing surprising to hear the Unification Ministry letting out such invective turning white into black as it is made up of human scum keen on hurting the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The group of rabid dogs is not able to feel fragrance.
					
					 No matter how ill-minded and crooked the puppet group of traitors may be, it can never deny the above-said stirring reality in the northern part of the DPRK and the happy laughter of the people.
					
					 The group of traitors is running the whole gamut of nonsensical talks in a bid to mislead the public opinion. However, it can never tarnish the image of the most advantageous Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses nor can it cover up the stirring reality in which the policy of loving the people is being pursued by the party which regards it as its fundamental mission and mode of existence to serve the people.
					
					 The riff-raff of the puppet conservative media will have to pay a dear price for daring hurt the DPRK as they are going reckless in their smear campaign against it while siding with the treacherous regime on the verge of bankruptcy after discarding the mission of media which should speak for justice and truth and herald the era. 
					
					 No matter how noisily the group of dogs may bark, the bright moon in the sky will continue to shed its light.

articles.title: NRC Spokesman on Park Geun Hye's Moves for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
NRC Spokesman on Park Geun Hye's Moves for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Recently traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea summoned the riffraff to Chongwadae and held what they called "ceremony of conferring writs of appointment" to present "writs of appointment" to "provincial governors" of "five provincial committee of the north" and had a photo session with them.
					 In this regard, a spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council issued a statement on Nov. 25.
					
					 The "ceremony" represents Park's hysterics of escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, the statement said, adding: This ridiculous action was prompted by her petty trick to calm down the angered people and prolong her remaining days at any cost by creating the impression that she is doing the "administration".
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The council bitterly denounces the anti-DPRK action of Park, branding it as another unpardonable politically-motivated provocation and last-ditch efforts of a confrontational maniac driven into a dilemma.
					
					 The action was also prompted by the black-hearted intention to weather the worst crisis by creating the climate of the "security crisis" and "instability" after getting on the nerves of the DPRK.
					
					 No matter how desperately Park may try to overcome the ruling crisis through the confrontation, she can never avert or block the massive public protests.
					
					 Such a foolish act will only push her to her grave.

articles.title: WHO Assistant Director General Arrives
articles.content:
WHO Assistant Director General Arrives
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Oleg Chestnov, assistant director general of the World Health Organization, and his party arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Public Health Leaves for Qatar
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Public Health Leaves for Qatar 
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Public Health led by Minister Kang Ha Guk left here on Saturday for Qatar to attend an international meeting for worldwide public health innovation to be held in Doha.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A Japanese delegation for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism headed by Sakae Araki arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday to pay tribute to them.
					 On the same day the assistant director general of the WHO and his party visited the statues on Mansu Hill.

articles.title: Increased Production Witnessed at Stockbreeding Bases in DPRK
articles.content:
Increased Production Witnessed at Stockbreeding Bases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Stockbreeding bases in the DPRK have boosted production by applying scientific and rational methods.
					 Technicians of the Hungju Chicken Farm succeeded in producing urea protein fodder to raise the weight increment of chickens and introduced an automatic candling machine into hatching.
					
					 The Sinuiju Chicken Farm made such achievements as raising the absorption rate of fodder to increase the per-egg weight.
					
					 The Kwangpho Duck Farm have produced hundreds tons of animal protein fodder every year and reared 1.3 times more ducky this year than last.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Army-People Ryongchon Pig Farm and Phyongbuk Pig Farm put their production under scientific veterinary and anti-epizootic system and raise the proportion of non-cereal feed based on compound lactobacilli, thus producing much more meat.

articles.title: Exhibits Conducive to Sports Development
articles.content:
Exhibits Conducive to Sports Development
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The 20th National Exhibition of Sports Scientific and Technological Achievements was held in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, some days ago. More than 1 400 exhibits were on display at the exhibition.
					 What drew attention of experts and visitors were sports apparatuses, measuring apparatuses, medicines and nutrients.
					
					 Among them were high-quality synthetic grass presented by the State Academy of Sciences and football, basketball, volleyball and multi-purpose bags produced by the Pyongyang Sports Apparatus Factory.
					
					 Recipes for apricot-based nutritive foods, traditional Koryo therapies and medicines and nutrients for sportspersons also enjoyed great popularity.

articles.title: Japan-S. Korea Agreement on Protection of Military Intelligence Slammed
articles.content:
Japan-S. Korea Agreement on Protection of Military Intelligence Slammed
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK carried commentaries Saturday slamming the agreement on protection of military intelligence concluded by Japan and south Korea.
					 Terming the south Korean Park Geun Hye regime's act a blatant challenge to all Koreans determined to make Japan pay dearly for its past crimes and an unpardonable act of treachery helping the sworn enemy of the Korean nation pave the way for launching reinvasion, Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Park Geun Hye, who has become a "breathing mummy" after being forsaken by the public for her hideous scandal, seeks to stay in office with the backing of the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 Deeming it a good opportunity, the U.S. and Japan work hard to forge the triangular military alliance, establish MD system and lay a springboard for realizing the wild ambition for reinvasion before Park's ouster.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime, whose end is looming, hastily concluded a military pact with Japan under the pretext of "security" under pressure from the U.S. and Japan. This is aimed to divert public criticism away from Park's scandal to the DPRK and to stay in power by hyping its "leadership qualities."
					
					 No former rulers of south Korea dared conclude a military pact with Japan. But only Park, the old witch of Chongwadae on deathbed, dared do so, a thrice-cursed act of treachery peculiar to her alone who inherited the pro-Japanese gene from the top-class Japanese "Lieutenant Okamoto."
					
					 What is intolerable is that due to the witch, seized with inveterate sycophancy to big powers, the Korean peninsula is being reduced to a theater of scramble among big powers only to make the Korean nation fall victim to it. 
					
					 Minju Joson says Japan should cool their heads heated with the wild ambition for reinvasion and make a sincere apology and reparation for the bloody past crimes, instead of working hard to use Park who is more dead than alive for realizing its wild ambition for reinvasion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S. Not to Make Haste for THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S. Not to Make Haste for THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Russel, assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs of the U.S., blustered that the U.S.-south Korea alliance remains solid and the plan for the deployment of THAAD would be invariably pressed forward under whatever political situation in south Korea.
					 Brooks, commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea, said THAAD would be deployed in south Korea in 8 to10 months much earlier than late next year, the original schedule, and its scope would be bigger than what is deployed on Guam.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary that what they uttered goes to prove that the U.S. is in a hurry to complete the deployment of THAAD in south Korea at any cost before the collapse of the Park Geun Hye regime which it installed with so much effort.
					
					 The despicable moves of the U.S. once again clearly reveal before the world who is the arch criminal and the worst evil harassing peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia and sparking off an arms race among nuclear weapons states and bringing the danger of a nuclear war, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than trying to ward off the DPRK's strike of justice with THAAD.
					
					 The DPRK has powerful strike means capable of promptly disabling THAAD by making a surprise strike from an unpredictable place.
					
					 Its revolutionary armed forces have long put not only all the aggressive war means of the enemies but even their attack and logistic bases against the DPRK in the range of precision sighting strike.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. desperate moves to bring the disaster of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Extra-large Scandal in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Extra-large Scandal in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" is an inevitable product of the reactionary and unpopular social system in south Korea where "nexus between politics and business" and irregularities and corruption are prevailing, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The successive puppet ruling quarters of south Korea have considered fascist dictatorship and illegal accumulation of wealth as essential means for staying in power.
					
					 Meanwhile, plutocrats being parasitic under the patronage of power have grown corpulent at the cost of blood and sweat of the people, enjoying all kinds of privileges in return for providing money to the rulers.
					
					 This dirty nexus has produced a lot of scandals.
					
					 "Nexus between politics and business" and irregularities and corruption have prevailed as evil practices for a long time. This is attributable to the corrupt political landscape in south Korea. That is why the corrupt rulers and their clan have earned such ill fames as "king of thieves," "party taking truck load of money" and "party helping corrupt bigwigs."
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" which turned into her private party are nothing but poisonous mushrooms that have grown as a result of irregularities and corruption. 
					
					 What is more intolerable is that money maker Park Geun Hye is working hard to cover up the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the thrice-cursed crime, for a petty amount of money paid by the Japanese reactionaries and is making a bargaining for THAAD deployment by instigating the puppet military and plutocrats.
					
					 The flames of the struggle for Park Geun Hye's resignation raging throughout south Korea represent the resistance of the toiling masses who account for 99 percent of the population against the privileged who are just one percent of it.

articles.title: S. Korean Journalists Blast Authorities for Gagging Press
articles.content:
S. Korean Journalists Blast Authorities for Gagging Press
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Journalists of the south Korean newspaper Segye Ilbo made pubic a statement "Disclose the truth behind Park Geun Hye regime's operation to gag the press" on Nov. 23.
					 The statement said that the journalists of the daily hope that the truth behind the practices of gagging the press would be fully probed through investigation into the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" and all those involved in the case be punished.

articles.title: Massive Public Protests to Remove Park Geun Hye Planned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Massive Public Protests to Remove Park Geun Hye Planned in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The 5th all-people action and all-out protests are being prepared in south Korea to be held in late November to remove traitor Park Geun Hye at any cost, according to reports from Seoul.
					 The People's Emergency Action to Bring Down Park Geun Hye regime called a news conference in Seoul on Nov. 23, in which it declared that it would wage a more vigorous and positive struggle to force the regime to step down on Nov. 26 and that 1.5 million people would take part in the struggle in Seoul and 2 million across south Korea.
					
					 Meanwhile, people from all walks of life throughout south Korea including professors, religionists, and students of primary, secondary and senior high schools declared that they would take part in candlelight rallies on Nov. 26.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Slams Conclusion of Agreement on Protecting Military Intelligence with Japan under U.S. Pressure
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Slams Conclusion of Agreement on Protecting Military Intelligence with Japan under U.S. Pressure
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A south Korean online paper in an article on Nov. 23 said that the minister of Defense of south Korea and the Japanese ambassador to south Korea signed an agreement on protecting military intelligence at the Ministry of Defense building that day, and the agreement is similar to the one in 2012 that was scrapped just before ratification due to controversy over behind-the-door manipulation. 
					 On the same day, the Ministry of Defense refused the coverage of the news by media under the pretext of opposition from the Japanese side, the article said, adding that the ministry's resumed act of making the agreement unofficial is just the repetition of the same deed back in 2012.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime with no qualifications to operate the "state affairs" hastened the conclusion of the agreement under the U.S. pressure, the article noted.

articles.title: "Monuments" Praising Dictators in S. Korea Defiled
articles.content:
"Monuments" Praising Dictators in S. Korea Defiled 
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- South Korean people from all walks of life are shaking with towering resentment at "yusin" dictator Park Chung Hee and his daughter Park Geun Hye. "Monuments" in memory of them are being defiled.
					 A south Korean university student wrote letters "dictator" with red paint on the back of the bust of Park Chung Hee in a park of Kumi City, North Kyongsang Province on November 4.
					
					 A signboard set up at the birthplace of Park Geun Hye in Taegu had red paint sprayed on it on November 18.

articles.title: S. Korean Politicians Slam Park Geun Hye's Sycophantic and Treacherous Act
articles.content:
S. Korean Politicians Slam Park Geun Hye's Sycophantic and Treacherous Act 
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Voices of people from all walks of life are heard in south Korea denouncing traitor Park Geun Hye for her sycophantic and treacherous act as she pressed for the conclusion of an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan, according to reports. 
					 So Yong Gyo, a lawmaker of the Defense Commission of the "National Assembly", on Nov. 23 denounced the Park Geun Hye regime for resorting to the same treacherous act as that one century ago.
					
					 So accused the Park regime of concluding the agreement which was suspended due to the people's opposition in 2012.
					
					 Ri Jae Myong, mayor of Songnam City, Kyonggi Province, in an article said that Japan still remains hostile in military aspect, and if Japan realizes its ambition to become a military giant, the first target of attack will be the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Jong Tong Yong, a lawmaker from the Kukmin Party, at the press conference on Nov. 22 said that it is no more than a wild act to conclude the agreement with Japan which does not hide its territorial ambition over Tok Islets.

articles.title: Authorities Escape from "Park Geun Hye" Shipwreck: S. Korean Online Newspaper
articles.content:
Authorities Escape from "Park Geun Hye" Shipwreck: S. Korean Online Newspaper
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A south Korean online paper on Nov. 23 reported that confidants of traitor Park Geun Hye who remained in office to tackle the case of Park's scandal began escaping from the "Park Geun Hye" shipwreck one after another.
					 The paper recalled that Minister of Justice Kim Hyon Ung and Chief Secretary of Civil Administration of Chongwadae Choe Jae Gyong expressed their will to step down from office.
					
					 Kim Mu Song, former representative of the "Saenuri Party", clarified that he would take the lead in impeaching Park, it noted.

articles.title: Resignation of Park Geun Hye and Stop to Moves for Concluding Agreement with Japan Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of Park Geun Hye and Stop to Moves for Concluding Agreement with Japan Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The North Jolla Provincial Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment, the North Jolla Provincial Emergency Council for Resignation of Park Geun Hye and other civic organizations in south Korea on Nov. 22 held a press conference in front of the North Jolla Provincial Building of the "Saenuri Party" in Jonju City,  North Jolla Province in demand of the resignation of Park Geun Hye and stop to the moves for concluding an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan.
					 They said the agreement is aimed to back Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" and preemptive attack on the north. 
					
					 They urged Park Geun Hye to step down at once.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime of South Korea Censured for Treachery
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime of South Korea Censured for Treachery
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Anger at the Park Geun Hye regime's conclusion of the agreement on protection of military intelligence with Japan is running high among south Koreans and compatriots abroad.
					 Civic and social bodies including the Emergency People's Action for Ouster of the Park Geun Hye Regime held a press conference outside the building of the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense on Wednesday to denounce the regime's treachery. The organization issued a press release.
					
					 Meanwhile, students of south Korea launched a round-the-clock action that day to check the conclusion of the pact.
					
					 Even lawmakers from the Jongui Party of south Korea staged an action in protest against the conclusion of the agreement in front of the Ministry of Defense.
					
					 The European Regional Headquarters of Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany in a statement denounced the conclusion of the agreement with Japan.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounces U.S. for Seeking Its Own Profit in Vortex
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounces U.S. for Seeking Its Own Profit in Vortex 
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Friday carried an editorial titled "U.S. seeks its own profit in vortex".
					 The editorial said the candlelight action launched on Nov. 12 by more than one million people is growing stronger.
					
					 Tractor-march of peasants went near Chongwadae and a general strike of workers will be held at the end of this month and the Park Geun Hye regime is at stake now, it said, and went on:
					
					 Even seven of ten supporters of the "Saenuri Party" demand resignation of Park.
					
					 However, the agreement on protecting military intelligence has been concluded with Japan smoothly and quickly and the U.S. is behind the conclusion.
					
					 The U.S. will not be able to escape criticism for seeking its own profit in the vortex of administrative vacuum of the south Korean regime and its incompetence in diplomacy.

articles.title: S. Korean University Professors Demand Park Geun Hye Step down
articles.content:
S. Korean University Professors Demand Park Geun Hye Step down
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Professors at universities of fine arts across south Korea turned out in an action demanding Park Geun Hye's resignation, according to the south Korean KBS on Nov. 24.
					 78 professors affiliated to the University Art Consultative Council, an organization of professors at universities of fine arts across south Korea, in a statement denounced Park Geun Hye for bringing the foundation of democracy to collapse and making a mockery of the people as she left to those blinded with greed the power entrusted to her by the people
					
					 Expressing irrepressible astonishment at the scandal of blacklisting persons in the field of culture, they demanded Park Geun Hye apologize for monopolizing culture and art.
					
					 They stressed that Park disqualified as "president" should step down at once.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de esqui de batallon de la unidad 1045 del EPC
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el entrenamiento de esqui del batallon de infanteria de montana, adscrito a la unidad 1045 del EPC.
					Luego de escuchar el informe sobre el plan de ejercicios, el dio la orden de iniciarlo.
					
					Cuando se dio la orden del comandante de entrenamiento, los uniformados aparecidos por sorpresa en la cima de montana se deslizaron en esqui por la pendiente accidentada flameando la bandera del Comandante Supremo y la nacional.
					
					Contemplando a los militares que patinan a todo galope cumpliendo bien dificiles reglamentos de accion en combate, el Comandante Supremo califico de excelente el entrenamiento de los infantes de montana.
					
					Instruyo elevar decisivamente el arte de tiro de los soldados, su capacidad de escalar y marchar en la montana, asaltar y sobrevivir a la intemperie al renovar sin parar en lo cualitativo las formas y metodos de entrenamiento conforme a la demanda de guerra moderna y a las particularidades de la zona operacional de ataque y defensa y presentar al maximo las exigencias sobre los ejercicios en atmosfera de combate real.
					
					En el tiempo de emergencia, los infantes de montana deben asestar el golpe sorpresivo a los enemigos sin darles el tiempo de volverse en si desplazandose velozmente en las montanas del teatro de accion en combate, enseno y puntualizo que los comandantes deben cultivar la bravura y agilidad de los infantes de montana al organizar como batalla real el entrenamiento de combate montanoso aprovechando la topografia y objetos terrestres mas abruptos.
					
					Evaluando altamente el exitoso entrenamiento, se retrato con los militares del batallon.
					
					Presento las tareas que corresponden a las unidades de infanteria de montana destacando que es muy importante la mision de combate que van a cumplir los infantes de ese tipo en nuestro pais donde las sierras escarpadas estan distribuidas como biombo y caen muchas nieves. 
					
					Presencio el entrenamiento Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Serbia
articles.content:
CRN refuta demagogia anti-RPDC de la banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Las zonas septentrionales de Corea que sufrieron por grave desastre de la naturaleza, se han convertido al cabo de 2 meses en las aldeas maravillosas socialistas, provocando gran admiracion de todo el mundo. Y se extendio en el Mar Este de Corea un paisaje espectacular de pesca abundante. 
					Las risas de todo el pueblo coreano en el Dia de la Madre resuenan por doquier del pais como una sinfonia de la vida bendita. 
					
					Solo la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye y sus compinches sueltan los disparates virulentos que niegan la realidad maravillosa de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envidiada por todo el mundo. 
					
					Revelo asi el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional en su declaracion fechada 26 y continuo:
					
					Cuando se han levantado nuevas calles y aldeas en las zonas septentrionales damnificadas de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y los habitantes locales se mudaban con alegria a nuevas viviendas, los tipejos del Ministerio titere de Unificacion del Sur de Corea disparatearon que el Norte de Corea acabo apresuradamente la campana de reparacion a fin de "dar animo a los moradores y propagar el espiritu de amor al pueblo", mientras algunos medios de prensa conservadores y venales del Sur de Corea calumniaron que "la noticia sobre abundante pesca del Norte de Corea no pasa de ser una artimana para obtener un merito" y que "la institucion del Dia de la Madre en el Norte de Corea es una tactica para embellecer su regimen". 
					
					No son asombrosas los chismes anti-RPDC de los compinches del Ministerio titere de Unificacion, reconocido como colectivo de escorias humanas acostumbradas a las calumnias a la parte connacional. 
					
					Aunque la banda titere surcoreana, maniaca de enfrentamiento fratricida y traidora a la nacion, tienen las malas entranas, no pueden negar el milagro maravilloso en las zonas septentrionales del pais ni las melodias alegres de la Cancion de Abundante Pesca en el Mar ni las risas jubilosas de los habitantes de la parte Norte.
					
					Por mas que los traidores surcoreanos hagan esfuerzos desesperados por inducir en error la opinion publica soltando las sofisterias anti-RPDC, no pueden manchar nunca la imagen del mas ventajoso regimen socialista coreano centrado en las masas populares ni ocultar la realidad sorprendente de esta sociedad socialista donde se practica la politica de amor al pueblo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que considera el servicio abnegado al pueblo como su mision fundamental y modo de existencia. 
					
					Advertimos que pagaran caro los medios de prensa conservadores surcoreanos que en adhesion al "poder" traidor en decadencia, recurren a la demagogia anti-RPDC, olvidando la mision de representante de la justicia y la veracidad y precursor de la epoca.
					
					La luna llena no pierde su luz por el ladrido de los perros.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Angola
articles.content:
Vocero del CRN se burla de Park Geun-hye que trata de salvarse de la crisis
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la traidora Park Geun-hye llamo a los fulanos y menganos a Chongwadae para la llamada "ceremonia de entrega de cartas de nombramiento de nuevos cargos administrativos". En esa ocasion, armo la farsa conflictiva anti-RPDC entregando las "cartas de nombramiento" a los "gobernadores de los comites de 5 provincias del Norte (de Corea)" y tomando las fotos con ellos.
					En su declaracion publicada la vispera, el vocero del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional condena que esa ceremonia deviene una expresion de la cronica y morbosa furia conflictiva con la parte connacional de Park, y prosigue:
					
					Asimismo, esa ridiculez partio del truco barato de ella de aplacar el creciente animo de lucha del pueblo y mantener, cueste lo que cueste, su precaria vida politica al fingir que gestiona los "asuntos estatales".
					
					El CRN condena categoricamente la nueva farsa calificandola de imperdonable provocacion politica anti-RPDC y ultimo pataleo de la maniaca de enfrentamiento fratricida que esta a punto de arruinamiento.
					
					Park tiene la astuta intencion de remediar la peor situacion de ahora creando la "crisis de seguridad" y la "incertidumbre de seguridad" al irritar a la RPDC.
					
					Por muy desesperadas que fueran sus acciones para evadir la crisis de gobernacion mediante la campana de confrontacion fratricida, no podra impedir por nada las fuertes protestas masivas de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Sus actos imbeciles no daran otro resultado que adelantar su muerte tragica.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Llegan subdirector general de la OMS y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El subdirector general de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud, Oleg Chestnov, y sus acompanantes llegaron este sabado a esta capital.
